00061       fSiliconChannels.insert(i);
00062    }
00063 
00064    for (int i=0; i<N_BUNCHES; i++) {
00065       BeamBunch bbunch;
00066       fBeamBunches[i+1] = bbunch;
00067    }
00068 }

00097 
00099 void MeasInfo::SetBeamEnergy(Float_t beamEnergy)
00100 {
00101    fBeamEnergy = beamEnergy;
00102 
00103    UInt_t approxBeamEnergy = (UInt_t) (fBeamEnergy + 0.5);
00104 
00105    if (approxBeamEnergy >= 2*kINJECTION)
00106       // this number comes from the online config files. May need to add it to the run_info DB table in the future
00107       fExpectedGlobalTimeOffset = -8;
00108    else
00109       fExpectedGlobalTimeOffset = 0;
00110 
00111    fExpectedGlobalTdcOffset = (Short_t) (fExpectedGlobalTimeOffset / WFD_TIME_UNIT_HALF + 0.5);
00112 
00113    Info("SetBeamEnergy", "Expected time offset: %f %d\n", fExpectedGlobalTimeOffset, fExpectedGlobalTdcOffset);
00114 }

00130 void MeasInfo::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00131 {
00132    fprintf(f, "$rc['fRunId']                          = %d;\n",     fRunId          );
00133    fprintf(f, "$rc['RUNID']                        = %.3f;\n",   RUNID        );
00134    fprintf(f, "$rc['fRunName']                     = \"%s\";\n", fRunName.c_str() );
00135    fprintf(f, "$rc['fStartTime']                   = %ld;\n",    fStartTime   );
00136    fprintf(f, "$rc['fStopTime']                    = %ld;\n",    fStopTime    );
00137    fprintf(f, "$rc['fRunTime']                     = %f;\n",     fRunTime      );
00138    fprintf(f, "$rc['fDataFormatVersion']           = %d;\n",     fDataFormatVersion);
00139    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAsymVersion']                 = \"%s\";\n", fAsymVersion.c_str());
00140    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMeasType']                    = %#010X;\n", fMeasType);
00141    fprintf(f, "$rc['fNEventsProcessed']            = %u;\n",     fNEventsProcessed);
00142    fprintf(f, "$rc['fNEventsTotal']                = %u;\n",     fNEventsTotal);
00143    fprintf(f, "$rc['GoodEventRate']                = %f;\n",     GoodEventRate);
00144    fprintf(f, "$rc['EvntRate']                     = %f;\n",     EvntRate     );
00145    fprintf(f, "$rc['ReadRate']                     = %f;\n",     ReadRate     );
00146    fprintf(f, "$rc['fWallCurMon']                  = %s;\n",     MapAsPhpArray<UShort_t, Float_t>(fWallCurMon).c_str() );
00147    fprintf(f, "$rc['fWallCurMonAve']               = %f;\n",     fWallCurMonAve );
00148    fprintf(f, "$rc['fWallCurMonSum']               = %f;\n",     fWallCurMonSum );
00149    fprintf(f, "$rc['fBeamEnergy']                  = %f;\n",     fBeamEnergy  );
00150    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMachineParams']['fCavity197MHzVoltage'][0]   = %d;\n",     fMachineParams.fCavity197MHzVoltage[0]  );
00151    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMachineParams']['fCavity197MHzVoltage'][1]   = %d;\n",     fMachineParams.fCavity197MHzVoltage[1]  );
00152    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMachineParams']['fSnakeCurrents'][0]         = %f;\n",     fMachineParams.fSnakeCurrents[0]  );

00192

00197 // Description : print out spin (Mode=0), fill (Mode=1) pattern
00198 // Input       : Mode
00199 void MeasInfo::PrintBunchPatterns() const
00200 {
00201    std::stringstream ssSpin("");
00202    std::stringstream ssFill("");
00203 
00204    BeamBunchIterConst ibb = fBeamBunches.begin();
00205 
00206    for (int i=0; ibb!=fBeamBunches.end(); ++ibb, i++) {
00207 
00208       if (i%10 == 0) { ssSpin << " "; ssFill << " "; }
00209 
00210       if (ibb->second.fBunchSpin > 0)      ssSpin << "+";
00211       else if (ibb->second.fBunchSpin < 0) ssSpin << "-";
00212       else                                 ssSpin << ".";
00213       ssFill << (UShort_t) ibb->second.fIsFilled;
00214    }
00215 
00216    // Print Spin Pattern and Recover Spin Pattern by User Defined ones
00217    cout << "\nSpin pattern:" << endl;
00218    cout << ssSpin.str() << endl;
00219 
00220    // Print Fill Pattern and Recover Fill Pattern by User Defined ones
00221    cout << "\nFill pattern:" << endl;
00222    cout << ssFill.str() << endl;
00223 
00224 }

00227 // Print Out Configuration information
00228 void MeasInfo::PrintConfig()
00229 {
00230    fprintf(stdout, "=== RHIC Polarimeter Configuration (BGN) ===\n");
00231 
00232    // Configulation File
00233    fprintf(stdout,"         RUN STATUS = %s\n", gRunDb.run_status_s.c_str());
00234    fprintf(stdout,"         MEAS. TYPE = %s\n", gRunDb.measurement_type_s.c_str());
00235    fprintf(stdout,"             CONFIG = %s\n", reConfFile);
00236    fprintf(stdout,"              CALIB = %s\n", CalibFile);
00237 
00238    // tshift in [ns]
00239    fprintf(stdout, "             TSHIFT = %.1f\n", gAsymAnaInfo->tshift);
00240 
00241    // expected reference rate
00242    if (fRunId==5)   fprintf(stdout,"     REFERENCE_RATE = %.4f\n", gAsymAnaInfo->reference_rate);
00243 
00244    // target count/mm
00245    fprintf(stdout,"    TARGET_COUNT_MM = %.5f\n", gAsymAnaInfo->target_count_mm);
00246 
00247    // print comment
00248    if (strlen(gRunDb.comment_s.c_str())>3)
00249      printf("            COMMENT = %s\n",    gRunDb.comment_s.c_str());
00250 }

00263 
00268 Double_t MeasInfo::CalcSpinFlipperPhase()
00269 {
00270    UInt_t spinFlipperMarkerRevId = fSpinFlipperMarkers.size() > 0 ? fSpinFlipperMarkers[0] : 0;
00271    Double_t delta_phase = _TWO_PI * (fAcDipolePeriod/_RHIC_AC_DIPOLE_MAX_PERIOD) * ( (Double_t) spinFlipperMarkerRevId - fFirstRevolution);
00272    fSpinFlipperPhase    = fmod(delta_phase, _TWO_PI);
00273    return fSpinFlipperPhase;
00274 }
00275 
00276 
00278 Short_t MeasInfo::GetPolarimeterId()
00279 {
00280    TObjArray *subStrL = TPRegexp("^\\d+\\.(\\d)\\d{2}(|\\.alpha0)$").MatchS(fRunName);
00281 
00282    if (subStrL->GetEntriesFast() < 1) {
00283       Error("GetPolarimeterId", "Cannot extract polarimeter id from run name");
00284       return -1;
00285    }
00286 
00287    TString spolid = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(1))->GetString();
00288    delete subStrL;
00289 
00290    fPolId = spolid.Atoi();
00291 
00292    if (fPolId >=0 && fPolId <=3)
00293       GetBeamIdStreamId(fPolId, fPolBeam, fPolStream);
00294    else {
00295       Error("GetPolarimeterId", "Invalid polarimeter ID");
00296       return -1;
00297    }
00298 
00299    return fPolId;
00300 }
00301 
00302 
00304 Short_t MeasInfo::GetPolarimeterId(short beamId, short streamId)
00305 {
00306    if (beamId == 1 && streamId == 1) { fPolId = 3; return 3; }
00307    if (beamId == 1 && streamId == 2) { fPolId = 1; return 1; }
00308    if (beamId == 2 && streamId == 1) { fPolId = 0; return 0; }
00309    if (beamId == 2 && streamId == 2) { fPolId = 2; return 2; }
00310    if (beamId == 2 && streamId == 0) { fPolId = kHJET; return kHJET; }
00311 
00312    printf("WARNING: MeasInfo::GetPolarimeterId(): Invalid polarimeter ID\n");
00313    return -1;
00314 }
00315 
00316 
00318 UInt_t MeasInfo::GetFillId()
00319 {
00320    TObjArray *subStrL = TPRegexp("^(\\d+)\\.\\d{3}(|\\.alpha0)$").MatchS(fRunName);
00321 
00322    if (subStrL->GetEntriesFast() < 1) {
00323       Error("GetFillId", "Cannot extract fill Id from run name");
00324       return 0;
00325    }
00326 
00327    TString sfillid = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(1))->GetString();
00328    delete subStrL;
00329 
00330    UInt_t fFillId = sfillid.Atoi();
00331 
00332    if (fFillId <=0 ) {
00333       Error("GetFillId", "Invalid fill ID");
00334       return 0;
00335    }
00336 
00337    return fFillId;
00338 }

00340 
00341 bool MeasInfo::IsRunYear(int year)
00342 {
00343    time_t t = fStartTime;
00344    struct tm *time = gmtime(&t);
00345    int meas_year = 1900 + time->tm_year;
00346    return meas_year == year;
00347 }
00348 
00349 
00351 void MeasInfo::GetBeamIdStreamId(Short_t polId, UShort_t &beamId, UShort_t &streamId)
00352 {
00353    if (polId == 0) { beamId = 2; streamId = 1; };
00354    if (polId == 1) { beamId = 1; streamId = 2; };
00355    if (polId == 2) { beamId = 2; streamId = 2; };
00356    if (polId == 3) { beamId = 1; streamId = 1; };
00357 
00358    beamId = 0; streamId = 0;
00359 }
00360 
00361 
00363 void MeasInfo::Update(DbEntry &rundb)
00364 {
00365    stringstream sstr;
00366    UShort_t     chId;
00367 
00368    sstr << rundb.fFields["DISABLED_CHANNELS"];
00369 
00370    while (sstr >> chId) {
00371       DisableChannel(chId);
00372    }
00373 
00374    // For compatibility reasons set the Run variable
00375    // Taken from AsymRunDb
00376    if (RUNID < 6500) { // Run undefined
00377       fRunId = 0;
00378 
00379    } else if (RUNID >= 6500 && RUNID < 7400) { // Run05
00380       fRunId = 5;
00381       for (int i=0; i<N_SILICON_CHANNELS; i++) gPhi[i] = phiRun5[i];
00382 
00383    } else if (RUNID >= 7400 && RUNID < 10018) { // Run06
00384       fRunId = 6;
00385       for (int i=0; i<N_SILICON_CHANNELS; i++) gPhi[i] = phiRun6[i];
00386 
00387    } else if (RUNID >= 10018 && RUNID < 14000) { // Run09
00388       fRunId = 9;
00389 
00390    } else
00391       fRunId = 11;
00392 }
00393 
00394 
00396 void MeasInfo::Update(MseMeasInfoX& run)
00397 {
00398    stringstream sstr;
00399    UShort_t     chId;
00400 
00401    sstr << run.disabled_channels;
00402 
00403    while (sstr >> chId) {
00404       DisableChannel(chId);
00405    }
00406 
00407    // Check for horizontal targets and disable 90 degree detectors
00408    if (fTargetOrient == 'H') {
00409       bitset<N_DETECTORS> disabled_horiz_det(string("010010"));
00410       DisableChannels(disabled_horiz_det);
00411    }
00412       
00413    // by fill id
00414    if (RUNID < 6500) { // Run undefined
00415       fRunId = 0;
00416 
00417    } else if (RUNID >= 6500 && RUNID < 7400) { // Run 5
00418       fRunId = 5;
00419       for (int i=0; i<N_SILICON_CHANNELS; i++) gPhi[i] = phiRun5[i];
00420 
00421    } else if (RUNID >= 7400 && RUNID < 10018) { // Run 6
00422       fRunId = 6;
00423       for (int i=0; i<N_SILICON_CHANNELS; i++) gPhi[i] = phiRun6[i];
00424 
00425    } else if (RUNID >= 10018 && RUNID < 11100) { // Run 9
00426       fRunId = 9;
00427    } else if (RUNID >= 14000 && RUNID < 15500) { // Run 11
00428       fRunId = 11;
00429    } else if (RUNID >= 16000 && RUNID < 16800) { // Run 12
00430       fRunId = 12;
00431    } else if (RUNID >= 17000 ) { // Run 13
00432       fRunId = 13;
00433       gCh2WfdMap = ch2WfdMap_run13;
00434    } else {
00435       // default Run value
00436    }
00437 }

00441 void MeasInfo::Update(MseRunPeriodX& runPeriod)
00442 {
00443    fAlphaSourceCount = UChar_t(runPeriod.alpha_source_count);
00444    fProtoCutSlope    = runPeriod.cut_proto_slope;
00445    fProtoCutOffset   = runPeriod.cut_proto_offset;
00446    fProtoCutWidth    = (unsigned char) runPeriod.cut_proto_width;
00447    fProtoCutAdcMin   = runPeriod.cut_proto_adc_min;
00448    fProtoCutAdcMax   = runPeriod.cut_proto_adc_max;
00449    fProtoCutTdcMin   = runPeriod.cut_proto_tdc_min;
00450    fProtoCutTdcMax   = runPeriod.cut_proto_tdc_max;
00451    fPulserCutAdcMin  = runPeriod.cut_pulser_adc_min;
00452    fPulserCutAdcMax  = runPeriod.cut_pulser_adc_max;
00453    fPulserCutTdcMin  = runPeriod.cut_pulser_tdc_min;
00454    fPulserCutTdcMax  = runPeriod.cut_pulser_tdc_max;
00455 }

00462 void MeasInfo::Update(AsymAnaInfo& anaInfo)
00463 {
00464    if (anaInfo.fAlphaSourceCount >= 0)
00465       fAlphaSourceCount = anaInfo.fAlphaSourceCount;
00466 
00467    if (anaInfo.fAcDipolePeriod > 0)
00468       fAcDipolePeriod = anaInfo.fAcDipolePeriod;
00469 }

00471 
00472 void MeasInfo::UpdateRevolutions(UInt_t revId)
00473 {
00474    if (revId < fFirstRevolution) fFirstRevolution = revId;
00475    if (revId > fLastRevolution)  fLastRevolution  = revId;
00476 }

00478 
00479 // Description : Identify Polarimety ID and RHIC Beam (blue or yellow)
00480 // Input       : char RunID[]
00481 void MeasInfo::SetPolarimetrIdRhicBeam(const char* RunID)
00482 {
00483   char ID = *(strrchr(RunID,'.')+1);
00484 
00485   switch (ID) {
00486   case '0':
00487      fPolBeam      = 2;
00488      PolarimetryID = 1; // blue polarimeter-1
00489      fPolStream    = 1;
00490      break;
00491   case '1':
00492      fPolBeam      = 1;
00493      PolarimetryID = 1; // yellow polarimeter-1
00494      fPolStream    = 2;
00495      break;
00496   case '2':
00497      fPolBeam      = 2;
00498      PolarimetryID = 2; // blue polarimeter-2
00499      fPolStream    = 2;
00500      break;
00501   case '3':
00502      fPolBeam      = 1;
00503      PolarimetryID = 2; // yellow polarimeter-2
00504      fPolStream    = 1;
00505      break;
00506   default:
00507      Error("SetPolarimetrIdRhicBeam", "Unrecognized RHIC beam and Polarimeter-ID. Perhaps calibration data..?");
00508      break;
00509   }
00510 }
00511 
00512 
00514 void MeasInfo::DisableChannel(UShort_t chId)
00515 {
00516    Warning("DisableChannel", "Disabled channel %d", chId);
00517 
00518    if ( fDisabledChannels.find(chId) == fDisabledChannels.end() )
00519       fDisabledChannels.insert(chId);
00520 }
00521 
00522 
00524 void MeasInfo::DisableChannels(std::bitset<N_DETECTORS> &disabled_det)
00525 {
00526    for (UShort_t iDet=0; iDet!=N_DETECTORS; ++iDet)
00527    {
00528       if (disabled_det.test(iDet) )
00529       {
00530          for (UShort_t iCh=1; iCh<=NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR; ++iCh)
00531             DisableChannel(NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR*iDet + iCh);
00532       }
00533    }
00534 }
00535 
00536 
00538 void MeasInfo::EnableChannel(UShort_t chId)
00539 {
00540    Warning("EnableChannel", "Not implemented. Enabled channel %d", chId);
00541 }
00542 
00543 
00545 Bool_t MeasInfo::IsDisabledChannel(UShort_t chId)
00546 {
00547    return fDisabledChannels.find(chId) != fDisabledChannels.end() ? kTRUE : kFALSE;
00548 }
00549 
00550 
00552 Bool_t MeasInfo::IsSiliconChannel(UShort_t chId)
00553 {
00554    if ( chId > 0 && chId <= N_SILICON_CHANNELS)
00555       return true;
00556 
00557    return false;
00558 }
00559 
00560 
00562 UShort_t MeasInfo::GetNumDisabledChannels() const
00563 {
00564    return fDisabledChannels.size();
00565 }
00566 
00567 
00569 UShort_t MeasInfo::GetNumActiveSiChannels() const
00570 {
00571    UShort_t nCh = 0;
00572    ChannelSetConstIter iCh = fSiliconChannels.begin();
00573 
00574    for ( ; iCh != fSiliconChannels.end(); ++iCh) {
00575       if ( fDisabledChannels.find(*iCh) == fDisabledChannels.end() ) nCh++;
00576    }
00577 
00578    return nCh;
00579 }

00581 
00583 Bool_t MeasInfo::IsHamaChannel(UShort_t chId)
00584 {
00585    if ( ( (EPolarimeterId) fPolId == kB2D || (EPolarimeterId) fPolId == kY1D) &&
00586         ( (chId >= 13 && chId <= 24) || (chId >= 49 && chId <= 60) )
00587       )
00588       return true;
00589 
00590    return false;
00591 }
00592 
00593 
00595 Bool_t MeasInfo::IsPmtChannel(UShort_t chId) const
00596 {
00597    if ( ((EPolarimeterId) fPolId == kY2U || (EPolarimeterId) fPolId == kY1D) &&
00598         chId > N_SILICON_CHANNELS && chId <= N_SILICON_CHANNELS+4 )
00599       return true;
00600 
00601    return false;
00602 }
00603 
00604 
00606 Bool_t MeasInfo::IsSpinFlipperMarkerChannel(UShort_t chId) const
00607 {
00608    if ( (EPolarimeterId) fPolId == kB1U && chId == 76 ) // need to add a constrain by time
00609       return true;
00610 
00611    return false;
00612 }

00616 BeamBunchMap MeasInfo::GetBunches() const
00617 {
00618    return fBeamBunches;
00619 }

00621 
00623 BeamBunchMap MeasInfo::GetFilledBunches() const
00624 {
00625    BeamBunchMap bunches;
00626 
00627    BeamBunchIterConst ibb = fBeamBunches.begin();
00628 
00629    for (; ibb!=fBeamBunches.end(); ++ibb) {
00630       
00631       if (ibb->second.IsFilled())
00632          bunches.insert(*ibb);
00633    }
00634 
00635    return bunches;
00636 }
00637 
00638 
00640 BeamBunchMap MeasInfo::GetEmptyBunches() const
00641 {
00642    BeamBunchMap bunches;
00643 
00644    BeamBunchIterConst ibb = fBeamBunches.begin();
00645 
00646    for (; ibb!=fBeamBunches.end(); ++ibb) {
00647       
00648       if (!ibb->second.IsFilled())
00649          bunches.insert(*ibb);
00650    }
00651 
00652    return bunches;
00653 }
00654

00657 UShort_t MeasInfo::GetNumFilledBunches() const
00658 {
00659    return GetFilledBunches().size();
00660 }

00664 UShort_t MeasInfo::GetNumEmptyBunches() const
00665 {

00669 
00671 Bool_t MeasInfo::IsEmptyBunch(UShort_t bid) const
00672 {
00673    return !fBeamBunches.find(bid)->second.IsFilled();
00674 }
00675 
00676 
00678 ESpinState MeasInfo::GetBunchSpin(UShort_t bid) const
00679 {
00680    return fBeamBunches.find(bid)->second.GetSpin();
00681 }

00685 ERingId MeasInfo::GetRingId() const
00686 {
00687    switch (fPolBeam) {
00688    case 1:
00689       return kYELLOW_RING;
00690    case 2:
00691       return kBLUE_RING;
00692    default:
00693       return kUNKNOWN_RING;
00694    }
00695 }

00697 
00699 ETargetOrient MeasInfo::GetTargetOrient() const
00700 {
00701    switch (fTargetOrient) {
00702    case 'H':
00703       return kTARGET_H;
00704    case 'V':
00705       return kTARGET_V;
00706    default:
00707       return kUNKNOWN_ORIENT;
00708    }
00709 }

00717 
00718 
00720 EPolarimeterId MeasInfo::ExtractPolarimeterId(std::string runName)
00721 {
00722    TObjArray *subStrL = TPRegexp("^\\d+\\.(\\d)\\d{2}$").MatchS(runName);
00723 
00724    if (subStrL->GetEntriesFast() < 1) {
00725       gSystem->Error("ExtractPolarimeterId", "Cannot extract polarimeter id from run name");
00726       return kUNKNOWN_POLID;
00727    }
00728 
00729    TString spolid = ((TObjString *) subStrL->At(1))->GetString();
00730    delete subStrL;
00731 
00732    EPolarimeterId polId = (EPolarimeterId) spolid.Atoi();
00733 
00734    if ( gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.find(polId) == gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end() || polId == kUNKNOWN_POLID ) {
00735       gSystem->Error("ExtractPolarimeterId", "Invalid polarimeter ID");
00736       return kUNKNOWN_POLID;
00737    }
00738 
00739    return polId;
00740 }
